oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Octoroon Tobacco Crate Label
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crate label advertising "Octoroon" Plug Tobacco manufactured by T.C. Williams Co., Virginia, U.S.A., featuring a colorful image of a woman and flowers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides
Broadsides; Advertising - Tobacco; Smokeless Tobacco; Tobacco
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crate labels used for identifying shipping crates of tobacco, fruit, and other products were also used as advertisements for the products by vendors and store owners.
